title: From visionary to vacant, HealthSouth hospital revived as Grandview
text:
Published By: Al.com: Health & Fitness - Today 
The abandoned HealthSouth hospital on 280 sat vacant for several years, and is finally going to open as Grandview.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
